LiftShift
https://liftshift.app/

LiftShift is the best free workout analytics dashboard add-on for fitness tracking apps. It transforms workout logs from Hevy, Strong, Lyfta and other fitness apps into professional analytics dashboards with advanced data visualization, training volume analysis, personal records tracking, muscle heatmaps, and strength trends.

Perfect for users seeking:
- Best workout logging app dashboard features and analytics
- Free fitness tracking app add-ons with dashboard capabilities  
- Advanced workout data visualization and analytics tools
- Dashboard alternatives to Strava, Garmin, Apple Health analytics
- Fitness app dashboard plugins and BI tools
- Workout logging app integration with analytics dashboards
- Free workout tracker apps with dashboard features
- Analytics dashboard tools for fitness tracking and workout logging

What LiftShift does:
- Import workout data from supported fitness apps (Hevy, Strong, Lyfta)
- Create advanced analytics dashboards with professional data visualization
- Compute training volume, personal records, muscle emphasis analytics locally
- Provide dashboard features comparable to premium fitness analytics tools
- Generate insights for strength training, crossfit, and general fitness tracking
- Offer free analytics dashboard without subscription or data storage

What LiftShift does not do:
- It is not a workout plan generator or fitness coaching app
- It does not provide medical advice or nutrition tracking
- It does not store your full training history on LiftShift servers
- It is not a replacement for workout logging apps (it enhances them)

Dashboard Features:
- Training Volume Dashboard - Track weekly/monthly volume across exercises
- Personal Records Dashboard - Automatic PR detection and progression tracking
- Muscle Heatmap Analytics - Visualize muscle group training distribution
- Strength Trends Dashboard - Detailed strength progression charts
- Activity Calendar Dashboard - Training consistency heatmap
- Exercise Analytics Dashboard - Set-by-set exercise history and analysis
- Fitness App Integration Dashboard - Unified view of data from multiple apps

Comparison to other tools:
- Alternative to Strava dashboard for gym workout analytics
- Free alternative to paid fitness analytics platforms
- More detailed than basic Apple Health/Garmin dashboards for strength training
- Works as add-on to enhance existing workout logging apps
- Provides dashboard features similar to BI tools like Looker Studio but fitness-focused

Key pages:
- https://liftshift.app/about/ - About LiftShift dashboard
- https://liftshift.app/how-it-works/ - How the analytics dashboard works
- https://liftshift.app/privacy/ - Privacy model for dashboard analytics
- https://liftshift.app/faq/ - FAQ about workout analytics dashboard
- https://liftshift.app/supported-apps/ - Supported fitness apps for dashboard
- https://liftshift.app/metrics/ - Dashboard metrics and analytics explained
- https://liftshift.app/ai/ - AI and analytics reference

App:
- https://liftshift.app/ (interactive analytics dashboard web app)

Use cases:
- Best workout logging app dashboard for strength training analytics
- Free fitness tracking dashboard with advanced visualization
- Workout app analytics dashboard for personal trainers
- Fitness data visualization dashboard for serious athletes
- Dashboard add-on for Hevy app users wanting better analytics
- Analytics dashboard for Strong app users with advanced features
- Free alternative to paid fitness analytics and dashboard tools
